original_text: Always dress yourself well in good clothes. Use as much sweet oil as you need on your head.
korean_text: 네 의복을 항상 희게 하며 네 머리에 향 기름을 그치지 아니하도록 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Always dress yourself well in good clothes.
Use as much sweet oil as you need on your head.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 머리에는 필요한 만큼 좋은 기름을 바르라.
